sourcesContent:
import "./f.css" export default function F1() { return (

If you want to gather honey don’t kick the beehive

  • As much as we thirst for approval we dread condemnation
  • Criticism is dangerous because it wounds a person’s precious pride, hurts a person’s sense of importance and arouses resentment
  • By criticising we don’t make lasting changes we often incur resentment
  • Wrongdoers never blame themselves
  • The person whom we are trying to condemn will always justify him/her and try to condemn us inturn
  • Do you know someone you wish to change and improve - Good, but why not start with yourself - a lot more profitable and lot less dangerous
  • When dealing with people we must remember that we are not dealing with creatures of logic. We are dealing with creatures of emotion, creations bristling with prejudices and motivated by pride and vanity
) }
